title: Brownie toffee cheesecake
ingredients: ['1 (415g) box brownie mix', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon cold water', '425g toffee sweets, unwrapped', '150ml evaporated milk', '2 (200g) tubs cream cheese, softened', '100g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs', 'chocolate fudge sauce, for drizzling']
